I am passionate about solving tough problems and creating exciting applications to help the community and the world. Thank you so much for checking out my portfolio! If you want to talk some code or play some games, reach out to me on my LinkedIn. Thank you! ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Rock Paper Poke
projects.description: A great game for pokemon lovers! It is a game that can either be very fun for the user or help you solve real life problems the same way that rock paper scissors could. It uses pokemons battling and winner is determined on their element type!

projects.title: Terminal Trivia Trials
projects.description: A fun game of multiplayer trivia inside of your terminal with your friends. This was a group project for study on how we could make an app, back end only. This was a great way for us to learn how to utilize inquirer and socket with events listening to one another!

projects.title: Learn hub
projects.description: A community based learning application where the community can share their knowledge to others in the community! This was another group project for study to further our tools in react and redux. It was also a great way to refresh on Mongo. I feel that given some extra love this could be a great app if given time and the communities support!
